hero.title: Tourism & Leisure
hero.description: Join and subscribe to TYNDA. Let’s unite and make life in Kyrgyzstan brighter and more exciting!

recommendation.title: Recommended
recommendation.description: Choose your favorite categories and start your adventure!

adMobile.title: TYNDA Mobile App
adMobile.description1: On our platform, we aim to provide everything you need for a comfortable and safe trip around Kyrgyzstan. From information about attractions to booking accommodation and transport - everything in one place, with maximum simplicity and convenience.
adMobile.description2: TYNDA is your personal guide, assistant and service. You can get legal support, learn about upcoming events, sign up for excursions or find travel companions. We have combined useful things with opportunities to earn money: join our community and offer your own services or events.
adMobile.description3: With TYNDA you don’t just travel – you discover Kyrgyzstan in a new way.

about.title: About Company
about.description1: Our project’s club format offers special tools for participants and corporate discounts from our partners.
about.description2: With TYNDA, you can not only live and travel in Kyrgyzstan but also earn with us. Join our club and participate in our events or order a turnkey event.

hero.title: Choose Your Plan
hero.description: We have an offer for everyone. Select a club card plan that suits you, save on fees, spend wisely, and earn generous rewards.

touristicPlan.title: What Does the Tourist Club Card Offer?
bonuses: Discounts and deals up to 30% from partners

Ad banners and push notifications to attract customers
Online booking and payment (integration with your system)
Placement of promotions, discounts, and promo codes

text: Convenience—all essential services in one app.

Conductor.title: Tynda is your guide to the world of real Kyrgyzstan, as you saw it.
Conductor.description1: From cozy yurts under the starry sky to luxurious VIP tours - everything is in our app.
Conductor.description2: Tynda is the first and only online platform for tourism and recreation in Kyrgyzstan, where authenticity and modern comfort harmoniously combine. Here you will find any travel options - from a soulful rest in a traditional yurt to elite glamping and individual premium tours.

whyLeftCards: There's something for everyone - budget treks, cozy guest houses, boutique hotels and luxury residences.
Convenient booking - easy search, instant confirmation and secure payments.
whyRightCards: Unique experiences – horseback riding tours, trekking, gastronomic tours, SPA holidays and private excursions.
Personal approach - selection of the ideal option for your style and budget.
forWhomCards: For romantics - a night in a yurt under the endless sky, the sounds of nature and the aroma of a smoking fireplace.
For those who appreciate comfort, there are modern hotels with panoramic views and a high level of service.
For those who love luxury - private villas, individual guides and exclusive routes.
WhyTynda.openForYou: Discover the land of mountains through a new level of travel!
WhyTynda.yourWay: Tynda is your perfect path to the perfect journey.
